mapper.select: SELECT /*+ INDEX_DESC(tbl_point_history) */ idx, member_idx, point_amount, point_reason, is_plus, insert_ts FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{member.idx} OFFSET (#{cri.currPage} -1) * #{cri.amount} ROWS FETCH NEXT #{cri.amount} ROWS ONLY
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_member SET point = ((SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{idx} AND is_plus = 'Y') -(SELECT sum(point_amount) FROM tbl_point_history WHERE member_idx = #{idx} AND is_plus = 'N')) WHERE idx = #{idx}
